scripts.css:build: node-sass _sass/main/main.scss --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --output _css && postcss _css/main.css --replace && cleancss _css/main.css --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output _site/css/main.min.css
scripts.css:watch: chokidar "_sass/main/**/*.scss" --command "npm run css:lint && npm run css:build"
scripts.build: npm run css:lint && npm run css:build
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "npm run css:watch" "browser-sync http://0.0.0.0:5000 _site -w --no-open"
